text: Jaza | Lead Developer | Halifax, Canada OR Dar Es Salaam, Tanzania | Full Time | ONSITE | https://jobs.careerbeacon.com/details/software-engineer/1225... Jaza is the last mile energy company, building the future of distribution infrastructure in subsaharan Africa. We build solar energy hubs that provide affordable energy access to every home in a community. This is an opportunity to become a leading member of the software engineering team at Jaza, and build solutions for some of the greatest challenges facing the continent and the world: climate change and energy access.
